title: Comms4Docs 4+
subtitle: Medical Communication Skills
appDescription: The COMMS4DOCS App provides you with a dynamic library of phrases to enhance your interactions with patients; relatives; colleagues & teams. It can boost your exam performance; sharpen up your daily interactions; get you to the next career step. Whether you’re operating in your first, second or third language the COMMS4DOCS App shows you how to say it.
